attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it seams clear that many 40+people feel the same as me.I dont want ITcourses they no good for me.I want plumbing,electricail,building,roofing.no good at desk sitting.England needs Skills before they are all lost,we are watching are skills die.Im british born and bread i want british as in british not colour to be givin a chance to learn a skill,not pay through the nose,but to be givin the chance to get a skill that will push are country ahead.be able to get involved a push england ahead with pride.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
